title: It's mine, but I still love it
review: I am a part of this film. I am biased. I would still watch the crap out of this movie every year, cuddled up on the couch, with ice cream,

title: A film with a lot of heart.
review: Parker's Anchor is a story about starting over that most audiences will appreciate. It's got a cast of fun, quirky characters and pacing that keeps the story moving, yet gives the characters time to develop. If you're looking for a heart warming, female led, indie movie, this is one to see.
